name: Boots of Speed
additionalInfo: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack, the one with a higher value takes priority.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonus.
trivia: This item is based on the Boots of Speed from Warcraft 3.

recentChanges.description: CHANGED movement speed bonus from 15% to a flat 45.
CHANGED movement speed bonus from a flat 50 to 15%.
